```{r}
# Exercise 4.1.20
# Part (a)
library(caret)
obs <- c(0, 1, 0, 1)
pred <- c(0.25, 0.50, 0.60, 0.75)
confusionMatrix(factor(1*(pred > .7)), factor(obs), positive = "1")

# Part (b)
library(pROC)
roc.model <- roc(obs, pred)
par(pty = "s")
plot(roc.model)
points(c(1, 1, 0.5, 0.5, 0), c(0, 0.5, 0.5, 1, 1), cex = 1.5,
       pch = 16)

auc(roc.model)
```
